pages.text: $(li)The Backpack allows to you to have an extra inventory, this will be very useful in your journey.

$(li)To use the Backpack, first you have to open your inventory, access to the Curios API menu and equip the Backpack in the Backpack slot.$(br)$(li)Once equipped, you can press the B key to access the Backpack inventory.$(br)$(li)You will have 27 extra slots to save your items.$(br)$(li)You will not be able to unequip your Backpack if this one contains at least 1 item.

$(li)Like other containers, you can filter items to find them easily and sort the items in its interior too.$(br)$(li)You have the Customize button, if you click it, a new GUI will appears.$(br)$(li)In this GUI you can customize the aspect of your Backpack.

$(li)On the top, you have 3 checkboxs to allow or disallow to show the Enchantment Glint in the Backpack, show Elytras and show Backpack Effects while you have the Backpack equipped.$(br)$(li)In the middle, you can select multiple different designs for you Backpack, those changes are just cosmetic.

$(li)To unlock the Locked ones, you will have to complete the specific challenge which is indicated if you put the mouse on a Locked Backpack.$(br)$(li)It can be enchanted with $(l:patchouli:enchanted_books/backpacked/looted)Looted$(/l), $(l:patchouli:enchanted_books/backpacked/repairman)Repairman$(/l), $(l:patchouli:enchanted_books/backpacked/imbued_hide)Imbued Hide$(/l), $(l:patchouli:enchanted_books/backpacked/funneling)Funneling$(/l), $(l:patchouli:enchanted_books/backpacked/marksman)Marksman$(/l)
